hora chanda damima, sangraha kirima, ayuthu balapama, allasa, apekshakayekuge paudgalika charithaya ha hasirima gana asathya prakasha kirima wani dushitha kriyawakata (82 a â€“ ka dakwa upa waganthi) waradakaru karanu laba, eki waradakaru karanu labu dina sita wasara hathaka kalayak gathawi nothibima (chanda wimasimakata adalawa chanda himiyeku wimatada nohaka) mathiwarana nithiyata patahani giwisum athikara ganima, prawruththi pathrayaka ho widyuth madhyayak osse asathya prakasha pala kirima ho wikashanaya kirima, mathiwarana nithiyata patahani sewa niyukthin kirima wani nithi wirodhi kriyawakata waradakaru karanu labu, ema waradakaru kala dina sita wasara thunaka kalayak gathawi nothibima chandaye rahasya bhawaye widhiwidhana kada kirima (77 waganthiya) nama yojana pathra ha chanda pathrika sambandha waradi (78 waganthiya) chanda wimasana dinaye thahanam kriyawak kirima (81 a waganthiya), chanda wimasim kala simawakadi ath pathrika, danwim kola aadiya pradarshanaya kirima aadi waradi (81 aa waganthiya) bahu chandaya dima (82 waganthiya), hora chanda damima (82 a waganthiya), sangraha kirima (82 aa waganthiya), ayuthu balapama (82 u), prawruththi pathrawala, widyuth madhyawala asathya prakasha pala kirima (82 uu), nithi wirodhi sewa niyukthiyan (82 e), mudranakaru, prakashakage nama muhunatha nomathi prakashana mudranaya kirima, beda harima, alawima (82 ee), waradakaru wana thanaththeku ema waradata adala daduwamakata athirekawa waradakaru karanu labu dina sita wasara pahaka kalayak gathawi nothibima (82 ka waganthiya) 12.
ohu pakshapathi wiyayuththe swargaye pihituwa athi diwya rajyayatayi. 1914 sita jesu ehi rajakama daranawa.
